content:
Diagnosis:
Locally advanced nasopharyngeal carcinoma with bone metastases
EBV positive undifferentiated carcinoma (WHO Type III)
Initial staging T4N2M1

Previous treatment:
Induction TPF chemotherapy March-May 2023
Radical chemoradiotherapy completed August 2023
Maintenance Gemcitabine/Cisplatin from October 2023

Current medications:
Ondansetron 8mg bd
Dexamethasone 4mg bd on chemotherapy days
Magnesium supplementation

Current situation:
Pre cycle 6 Gemcitabine/Cisplatin

Latest imaging:
CT neck/chest/abdomen/pelvis 15 March 2024 - stable disease
MRI spine 20 March 2024 - no new bone lesions

Current status:
Reviewed today prior to cycle 6 maintenance chemotherapy. Performance status remains 1. Managing treatment well with grade 1 fatigue and occasional grade 2 nausea controlled with antiemetics. Latest blood results show stable renal function with eGFR 68, magnesium 0.72 corrected with supplementation. Hearing stable on recent audiometry. No new neurological symptoms. Weight maintained at 72kg.

Plan:
Proceed with cycle 6 Gemcitabine/Cisplatin at current doses
Repeat imaging after cycle 8
Follow up in 3 weeks with blood tests

cancer_timeline.value: MRI spine shows no new bone lesions

patient_facts.value: Grade 1 fatigue and occasional grade 2 nausea controlled with antiemetics

status_updates.value: Metastatic nasopharyngeal carcinoma with stable disease on maintenance chemotherapy
Grade 1 fatigue and grade 2 nausea, controlled with medications
Continuing with cycle 6 Gemcitabine/Cisplatin at current doses
Follow up in 3 weeks with blood tests
